name: next-middy-monorepo
description: Type-safe, composable middleware framework for Next.js API routes with optional Zod integration.
author: Eugene Odeluga <eodeluga@users.noreply.github.com> (https://github.com/eodeluga)

scripts.bootstrap: echo 'üì¶ Installing workspace deps‚Ä¶' && yarn install --silent && echo '‚úÖ Dependencies linked.'
scripts.build: yarn run clean && yarn run bootstrap && echo 'üèóÔ∏è Building‚Ä¶' && tsc -p tsconfig.json && echo '‚úÖ Build complete.'
scripts.clean: echo 'üßπ Cleaning‚Ä¶' && find . -type d \( -name 'node_modules' -o -name '.tsbuildinfo' -o -name 'dist' -o -name 'coverage' -o -name '.vitest-cache' \) -prune -exec rm -rf {} + && find . -type f \( -name 'yarn.lock' \) -delete && echo '‚úÖ Clean complete.'
